properties.areaDesc: St. Joseph; La Porte; Berrien; Marshall; Starke
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 5:56PM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
At 554 PM EST/454 PM CST/, an area of heavy snow was located along a
line extending from 9 miles northwest of Shorewood-Tower Hill to
near Three Oaks to near Mishawaka. Movement was southwest at 5 mph.
Visibility will rapidly deteriorate as this band moves southwest
across the advised area. Widespread visibility within this band will
range from one half mile to one mile with localized visibility as
low as one quarter mile. Additional snowfall of one inch to
one and one half inches possible with this band.

Locations impacted include...
South Bend, Mishawaka, Michigan City, La Porte, Plymouth, Westville,
Georgetown, Trail Creek, Gulivoire Park, Bridgman, Walkerton, North
Liberty, New Buffalo, New Carlisle, Three Oaks, Kingsford Heights,
Long Beach, Hamlet, Lakeville and Roseland.

This includes the following highways...
Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 38 and 78.
Interstate 94 in Indiana between mile markers 33 and 45.
Interstate 94 in Michigan between mile markers 0 and 17.

Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be
prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra
time when traveling.

NWSheadline: AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT ST. JOSEPH...NORTHEASTERN STARKE...NORTHWESTERN MARSHALL...LA PORTE AND SOUTHWESTERN BERRIEN COUNTIES
